name: CBOMBER
description: Crypto Bomber is a Play-to-Earn game with CBOMBER as token reward. This token has an auto staking function that pays USDT for its holders. Crypto Bomber is a Play to Earn NFT RPG developed on the Polygon Mainnet. The game revolves around the acquisition of blastering Bombs and powerful Heroes to detonate them agains Replicants. Players may participate in combat using their assets to earn CBOMBER tokens. Assets are player's owned NFTs minted in the ERC-721 standard which may be traded
